casebody.data:
David L. FELIX and Luis M. Felix, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
VOLKSWAGEN GROUP OF AMERICA, INC., Defendant-Movant,
and
Jack Daniels Volkswagen, Defendant. Eduardo Deang, Plaintiff,
v.
Volkswagen Group of America, Inc., Defendant-Movant,
and
Jack Daniels Volkswagen, Defendant. M-386 September Term 2017
079897 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 8, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is denied.
